code: @Test public void testHystrix() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived("Bye World").     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedPropertyReceived(HystrixConstants.HYSTRIX_RESPONSE_SUCCESSFUL_EXECUTION, true).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedPropertyReceived(HystrixConstants.HYSTRIX_RESPONSE_FROM_FALLBACK, false).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
